pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-1402 add subject alternative names field to certificate handling

commit.message: XRDDEV-1402 add subject alternative names field to certificate handling

nodes.bodyText: It is a good practice to use IANA reserved example domain names in documentation and tests (see e.g. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2606#section-3).

It is a good practice to use IANA reserved example domain names in documentation (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2606#section-3) instead of some arbitrary names that can be reserved.  E.g. "example.org" is one such domain.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -5326,6 +5327,13 @@ components:
           uniqueItems: true
           items:
             $ref: '#/components/schemas/KeyUsage'
+        subject_alternative_names:
+          type: string
+          format: text
+          description: certificate subject alternative names
+          example: DNS:*.dev.acme.org

nodes.bodyText: This variable could be private static final constant field in the CertUtils class, no need to recreate it every time this function is executed.
This variable could be private static final constant in the CertUtils class.
